the darknet convolution layer

Parameters:
  • {tf.tensor} -- a valid tensor (x) –
  • {int} -- the number of filters for the convolution (filters) –
  • {int} -- the size of the kernel patch (kernel) –
  • {boolean} -- to use batch normalization (batch_norm) –
  • {boolean} -- to use o not the downsampling (downsample) –
Returns:

tf.tensor – the output tensor
